wretched.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someone who is wretched is very unhappy or ill, and you feel sorry for them
wretched.translation[0].definitions[1].d: if you feel wretched, you feel guilty and unhappy because of something bad that you have done
wretched.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Guy felt wretched about it now.
wretched.translation[0].definitions[2].d: making you feel annoyed or angry
wretched.translation[0].definitions[3].e: I was shocked to see their wretched living conditions.
